attributes.action: prevent the drinking age being raised to 21
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe it would be unaffective for the Government to consider such a matter. It is also an insult to the over 18s who do drink sensibly.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "prevent the drinking age being raised to 21"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18323


Prime Minister's Office
